website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality body lotion in an affordable and convenient size that is great to have on hand to combat dry skin on-the-go.
pros: Includes mango seed butter, enzymes, and hyaluronic acid to moisturize skin all day
Absorbs quickly and is good for sensitive skin
cons: Does have a slightly musty smell since it has no added fragrance

customer_reviews.title: Smelly disappointment...
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I got of the Elta MD Body Creme was from my dermatologists' office. It was wonderful so I figured I would go the slightly cheaper route and buy it off Amazon... but comparing the two was like night and day! The first bottle (from dermatologist) was thick creamy texture and had no smell to it, the second bottle (that I order from Amazon) has a watery texture to it and has a very sour smell to it. I will be going back to my dermatologist to buy it from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Leaves Skin Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my dermatologist I was a little hesitant to switch from the moisturizer I typically use. It says for best results to apply after bath/shower. I applied this morning and 11 hours later, my arms looks like I just applied the moisturizer. My skin is soft, and not looking dry at all. Note that you don't need to apply as much as you do your regular moisturizer. Bit Pricy (Still less that dermatologist office) but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: gsasse

customer_reviews.title: My dermatologist recommended this moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion! My dermatologist recommended that I use it because I tan in a tanning bed and this dries out my skin. I've always had dry skin though and never could find a moisturizer that truly kept my skin feeling soft. I buy this creme on Amazon now so that I don't have to go to the doctor every time to purchase it, plus it is more affordable on here! I went from having to put lotion on every day, to now not even needing it but a few times a week since this creme actually renews skin cells. Would totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: HSB

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have tried numerous products for dry hands. My hands get very dry and sometimes even crack in the winter, since I am constantly washing them. I thought O'Keeffe's was pretty good until my dermatologists office mentioned this product. I guess several use this for their hands. Now I can see why. It absorbs quickly, and leaves your hands feeling silky smooth! Sure it costs more, but as far as I am concerned it is worth every penny. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: The smell
customer_reviews.text: This lotion smells distractingly bad. I had noticed another review complaining about the smell, but figured it must have been a sensitivity. I’m not sensitive to smells, but this literally smells like old cat pee on carpet in the heat. Not even joking. I know this smell and that is what this smell is. It is bad. And it lingers. Just bizarre.
customer_reviews.author: Slekker

customer_reviews.title: STINKS
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews about this product having an unpleasant, musty smell. IT DOES. I bought the travel size first to test, and that did not have the unpleasant smell at all and was fabulous; an excellent face and body moisturizer. Idk what's up with the bigger tube, but it does smell pretty bad. I could not use it. It's a shame because the ingredients are top-notch.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and nourishing- but odd scent
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality, thick lotion that is high quality like most EltaMD products would be. It's non-greasy and feels really nice- I've been using it on my pregnant belly to minimize itchiness and hopefully stretch marks. So far it definitely helps with the itch. I knocked it down 1 star though because it has kind of an odd smell. I don't really understand why they wouldn't put a light fragrance or try to fix it in some way, seems like an easy fix for a nice product. I usually just use this at night so the smell doesn't bother me.

product_meta.title: EltaMD Moisture-Rich Body Crème with Hyaluronic Acid, Fragrance-Free, Moisturizing Travel Size Body Lotion For Dry Skin, 2 oz.
product_meta.description:
EltaMD Moisture-Rich Body Crème infuses compromised and dry, flaky, sensitive skin with long-lasting moisture and essential nutrients. This luxurious, ceramide-enhanced formula with skin-smoothing enzymes and promotes a healthy skin barrier.This body lotion is fragrance-free and ideal for dry skin

BRAND STORY
EltaMD Skin Care is committed to helping you have great skin for life. Our company has developed sunscreen, skin care products and wound healing products trusted by physicians for more than 25 years.
